segments.text: I can't believe my eyes, the faucet's on full blast and the sink's pouring over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying a plate, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water puddle that's growing fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, a boy is on a stool that's wobbling like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar up in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand, balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's next to him, arm raised, looking for her cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful garden, totally unexpected with this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors framing the kids' sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the front of the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in an apron, apron, focused on that one dish towel task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, it could tip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is wild, mischief and mishap combined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never saw that coming in such a ordinary kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
